text: Andøy municipality is a Norwegian municipality in Nordland county. The municipality is on the island of Andøya. It has a population of 4,577 (as of 2023). ==Economy== Rockets without people onboard, sometimes get launched from the island. A rocket was launced as early as 18. august 1962; Its goal was to study the ionosphere in the (Arctic) polar area.«Rakettskytefeltet på Andøya bytter navn til Andøya Space Center», dagbladet.no, 5. juli 2014. Besøkt 10. juli 2014. Andøya Spaceport opened in 2023.https://www.nrk.no/nordland/klart- for-historisk-rakett-test-pa-andoya-_-ekspert-mener-norge-er-i-ferd-med-a- vinne-romkapplopet-1.17025666. Retrieved 2024-09-01 In 2025, the first Spectrum rocket was launched; That flight failed after 25 seconds.https://www.nettavisen.no/nyhetsvarsel/rakettoppskytingen-pa-andoya- feilet/s/5-95-2361914.
